{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15148v1", "title": "Uniformly resolvable decompositions of $K_v$ into $1$-factors and odd
  $n$-star factors", "summary": "We consider uniformly resolvable decompositions of $K_v$ into subgraphs such
that each resolution class contains only blocks isomorphic to the same graph.
We give a partial solution for the case in which all resolution classes are
either $K_2$ or $K_{1,n}$ where $n$ is odd.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO,math.GR", "published": "2025-04-21T14:52:40Z"}
